title: Legal advice for immigration and asylum problems

details.description: Where to get help and advice for immigration or asylum problems, and how to find a legal representative in your area.
details.body:
You can get advice on an asylum or immigration problem through the Office of the Immigration Services Commissioner.

You will be able to get details of advisers in your area, or help finding a legal representative.

Office of the Immigration Services Commissioner
0845 000 0046
info@oisc.gov.uk
Find a regulated immigration adviser

You can also find a solicitor or advice service using the legal adviser finder.

You may be able to get legal aid to pay for legal advice.
